name: html-dnd
description: HTML Drag and Drop Simulator for E2E testing

scripts.lint: eslint src lib tests && jscs src lib tests
scripts.local-test: mocha tests/unit/node && karma start karma.conf.js && mocha tests/e2e/html_dnd.js
scripts.test: mocha tests/unit/node && karma start karma.conf-ci.js && mocha tests/e2e/html_dnd.js

author: Kuniwak
